description: This file defines a SleepTools class that extends Toolkit, providing a sleep method to pause execution for a specified number of seconds, with logging before and after sleeping.

classes.name: SleepTools
classes.description: A class extending Toolkit that provides a sleep method with logging.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes SleepTools with a list containing the sleep method.

methods.name: sleep
methods.description: Pauses execution for the specified number of seconds, with logging before and after.
